name: [HELPERS] Test Data
description: Centralized test case store for workflow testing. Call this workflow with { workflow: 'WorkflowName', testCase: 'test-id' } to get test input data. All test cases sync automatically with workflow backups.

nodes.name: When Executed by Another Workflow
nodes.notes:
Input:
- workflow: Name of the workflow (e.g., 'TelegramContextScout')
- testCase: ID of the test case (e.g., 'contact-rag')

nodes.name: Test Cases
